text: John Smith announced that Microsoft will open a new office in Copenhagen next month.

text: Angela Merkel visited Paris last week to meet with Emmanuel Macron about climate policy.

text: Apple Inc. released a new product in California yesterday. Tim Cook presented the keynote.

text: I met with Jane Doe from Google at their office in Mountain View. Great discussion about AI.

text: The Prime Minister of Denmark spoke about climate change in Brussels at the EU summit.

text: Copenhagen is beautiful this time of year. Visiting Tivoli Gardens tomorrow.

text: Meeting Barack Obama in Washington D.C. was inspiring. We discussed education reform.

text: Tesla opened a new factory in Berlin. Germany is becoming a major EV manufacturing hub.

author: @user6
text: Traveling from London to Amsterdam by train. European rail network is so efficient.
